title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, such as a .properties file, in the package viewer, the synchronization process does not work as expected.
EB: I expect that when I select a .java file and another resource in the package viewer and initiate the synchronization process, it should successfully synchronize both files without any errors or issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file).
3. Initiate the synchronization process.
